name: Strange Winds (YuriNikolai)
description:
After crashlanding in a remote part of Antarctica, your flight crew experiences strange events.

----

This game was created in 20 days for the Winter 2022 OpenGameArt.org game jam. It makes extensive use of freely licensed visual assets and sound effects, and all original art created for it has been released under libre licenses as well!

Might patch and expand this game in a post-compo version, we'll see.

Credits for assets used are present in-game. I hope you have fun with the game :)

Note: The game's base resolution is 1920x1080. If your screen is smaller than that, the game window should be resizeable without issue, but let me know if you find problems with resized game screens or if you can't resize in your system.

----

Programmed by Yuri N. Martinez Laskowski and Lui Wolff

Art by Yuri N.
